changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE APP_EXCEPTION ( id int8 NOT NULL, CODE varchar(255) NOT NULL, MESSAGE varchar(255) NOT NULL, LOCALIZED_MESSAGE varchar(255) NOT NULL, CREATED_BY int8, LAST_MODIFIED_BY int8, CREATED_AT timestamp(6), DELETED_AT timestamp(6), DELETED_BY int8, LAST_MODIFIED_AT timestamp(6), CONSTRAINT app_exception_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT app_exception_code_ukey UNIQUE (CODE) );
